items.title: NRA furloughs staff as it prepares to rebuild ahead of 2026
items.description: The once-mighty gun rights group is trying to balance its books after years of misspending.

items.title: The first-term Democrat facing a Trump prosecution
items.description: “I don’t want to be in jail.” Rep. LaMonica McIver is fighting Trump in court — and risks 17 years behind bars.

items.title: Trump’s foe in tariffs case? A legal group funded by conservatives.
items.description: The Supreme Court test of Trump’s tariffs is backed by a legal group funded without disclosure by some of the wealthiest conservative donors.

items.title: Five big questions for Trump and Democrats on Election Day 2025
items.description: For the president, the party out of power and more, there is a lot at stake at the ballot box in Virginia, New Jersey, New York and California.

items.title: Senators look to Election Day to help break shutdown impasse
items.description: Lawmakers believe Tuesday’s elections will encourage senators in both parties to find a way to reopen the government.
